category: Click Boards > Power management > Battery Charger
name: mikroe.click.charger26
short_description: Charger 26 Click is a compact add-on board that provides a single-cell charging solution. This board features the MAX1811, a USB-powered Li+ charger from Analog Devices. The charger uses an internal FET to deliver the battery up to 500mA charging current. It has pre-conditioning that soft-starts a near-dead battery cell before charging.
